title: What are the lyrics to the song Soft Kitty? - Quora

response.answer_text: Soft Kitty, warm Kitty, little ball  of fur,Happy Kitty, sleepy Kitty, purr.. purr.. purr.  Only to be sung by females.Must be sung in one uninterrupted go. No pausing for thought allowed.Is only applicable when the recipient is sick, not if he is sad.Might have to be sung to virtual presence devices, or if the recipient uploads his consciousness to a robot.
It was written for an episode of Big Bang Theory. See:  The Big Bang Theory - Soft Kitty lyrics | LyricsMode.com
